name: SCEEnergyExpert
0:
”Alexa, ask Energy Expert what is my electricity cost for the last ten days”
”Alexa, ask Energy Expert when is a good time to run my appliances”
”Alexa, ask Energy Expert how much was my last bill”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: energy expert
des:
This skills is the voice interface to the SCE Pilot program. Once the system is set up, you can query your electricity costs, asks when is a good time to run your appliances, and other useful energy related requests.

When you ask for your total electricity use, the energy use (kWh) comes from your Emporia Vue and Green Button. 

When you ask when is a good time to run an appliance, the energy usage is an estimate for an average appliance. This will work whether or not you are using smart appliances.
